name: UnconTROLLable
description:
You have entered a dungeon to find the treasure of the Troll. The treasure is cursed and you will lose all controls once the secret chest is open. Explore the dungeon to take back control and eliminate the troll.

Art: Yerathel

Programming: Coderious

Final Battle Music: The Dungeon Master by Platinum Butterfly (c) copyright 2012 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/F_Fact/35997 Ft: Mana Junkie, Benjamin Orth
